fields_of_interest: Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
1. The designation of large-scale marine protected areas in the Southern Ocean (EU proposed). 
2. Implementation of the Common Fisheries policy. 
3. The Plastics Strategy & related (proposed) legislation.
goals__remit: I work with organisations, large and small, to realise desired change. This means working with them to develop strategies, on campaign and communications planning, advocacy, media relations, and engaging social media. Realising change means having obtainable objectives clearly articulated with a comprehensive strategy. Of course few strategies survive contact with reality, and that is where the real campaigning starts.
